title: Baki the Grappler
resume: Baki Hanma is a young fighter who yearns to follow in the  footsteps of his father, Yujiro, and become the strongest fighter in the  world. Thru that he trains tirelessly and fights constantly to hone his  skills and develop his body to achieve these goals. Many intense  battles lay ahead of Baki as he goes about his quest to be the best and  ultimately take the title of "King" from his father.
